name: JUNGHOME
0:
”Alexa, set the bathroom temperature to 22 degrees”
”Alexa, turn on the kitchen lighting”
”Alexa, turn on ceiling light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With the Alexa skill, you can use voice commands to control all devices in your home that are connected to the JUNG HOME Gateway.

The prerequisites for use are a JUNG HOME Gateway on site and a free registration on myJUNG (https://www.jung-group.com/account/login). 
After registration, link the JUNG HOME Gateway to your myJUNG account. 
Finally, connect to your installation in the Alexa app.

For example, use the following voice commands to control functions in your home: 
"Alexa, set the bathroom temperature to 22 degrees"
"Alexa, switch on the kitchen lighting" 
"Alexa, switch on the ceiling light"

Please contact your trusted electrical installer for more information about JUNG HOME.
